lead_paragraph: In 1976 Nice, Agnès Le Roux, the daughter of the owner of the Palais de la Méditerranée, falls in love with Maurice Agnelet, a handsome lawyer ten years who is older than she. Her love is obsessive and when he betrays her, Agnès attempts suicide and then disappears.
snippet: In 1976 Nice, Agnès Le Roux, the daughter of the owner of the Palais de la Méditerranée, falls in love with Maurice Agnelet, a handsome lawyer ten years who is older than she. Her love is obsessive and when he betrays her, Agnès attempts suicide...
